summary:
Always wanted to look like Harley Quinn?
Now you can!
And all this in a more lorefriendly way.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]
[font=Georgia][color=#f4cccc][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77040-0-1469113100.png[/img]
Do you want to play as Harley Quinn in Skyrim?
This mod is the perfect mod for you!
[/color][/font][/b][font=Georgia][b][color=#f4cccc]Don't forget to also check out my other presets from infamous Batman villians![/color]
[/b]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77093-7-1468523562.png[/img]
[color=#f4cccc]I did manage to make my own Harley Quinn character.[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]After posting pictures of her here at the nexus and at Deviantart, people asked me if I could make a follower mod...[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]Well I can't, but ThisTimeIBeAGoodGirlSir made a mod out of this! So check out this mod:[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77093/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D77093%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Harley Quinn -Standalone Follower[/url]

[color=#f4cccc]But instead, I made this: a Racemenu Preset.[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]This means that you can make your character look like Harley Quinn![/color]
[color=#f4cccc]But to do this, you need some important mods.[/color]

[b][color=#ff0000][size=5]Permission[/size][/color]
[/b][color=#f4cccc]I like the idea of a follower mod. Just like with Harley Quinn, I can not do that myself.
If one of you would like to make a follower mod, just contact me by sending a personal message.
Keep in mind that most of the features within this preset are from other modders.
So by making a follower mod, you will need the permission of the authors too.
(This for both the Required mods as the Recommended)[/color]

[b][color=#ff0000][size=5]Requirements:[/size][/color]
[/b][color=#f4cccc]RaceMenu[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]KS Hairdos[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]Fair skin complexion (with all the make-up features)[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]Stroja's Warpaints[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60769/?]http://www.nexusmods...im/mods/60769/?[/url]
[color=#f4cccc]Ravens Warpaint[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45641/?]http://www.nexusmods...im/mods/45641/?[/url]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77093-2-1468922305.png[/img]

[color=#ff0000][size=5][b]Recommended:[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#f4cccc]XP32 Skeleton Extended[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]UNP or CBBE bodytype. [/color]
[color=#f4cccc]Bodyslide[/color]

[b][color=#ff0000]Clothing:[/color][/b]
[color=#f4cccc]Well, if you want it to stay more lorefriendly, you should use the Dark Brotherhood outfits (Shrouded or Jester/Cicero)[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]Or, you can download several armor mods to try for yourself what armor is the best.[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]Or this "not so lore-friendly" armor: Harley Quinn Outfit[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]https://docs.google.com/file/d/0Bzj8ZEkOh_L0MzlqUG1ybTRPaEk/edit[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]Bodyslide by Diablio:[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]http://www.loverslab.com/index.php?app=core&module=search&do=search&fromMainBar=1

[/color][b][color=#ff0000][size=5]I hope you will enjoy the mod![/size][/color]
[/b][color=#f4cccc]Let me know what you think about this. [/color]
[color=#f4cccc]I accept requests for any other female characters from comics or games. Just let me know![/color]

[b][color=#ff0000][size=5]Check out my other mods![/size][/color][/b]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77225-0-1469022414.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77225?]Poison Ivy - RaceMenu Preset

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77254-8-1469103736.png[/img]

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77254/?]Catwoman - RaceMenu Preset[/url][/font][/center]
author: Yourskyrim123
